abilities.name: Volley Fire
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit.

abilities.name: Crack Shot
abilities.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack, on a Critical Wound, that attack has an Armour Penetration characteristic of -3.

abilities.name: CORE
abilities.description: Deep Strike, Leader

abilities.name: FACTION
abilities.description: For the Greater Good

abilities.name: Way of the Short Blade
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack that targets an enemy unit within 9", add 1 to the Wound roll.

abilities.name: Puretide's Teachings
abilities.description: Once per battle round, you can target this model’s unit with a Stratagem. If it does, reduce the CP cost of that use of that Stratagem by 1CP.

abilities.name: INDEPENDENT POWER
abilities.description: If your army includes COMMANDER FARSIGHT, it cannot include any ETHEREAL units. If your army includes any ETHEREAL units, it cannot include COMMANDER FARSIGHT.

abilities.name: Coldstar Commander:
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have a Move characteristic of 12" and ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [ASSAULT] ability.

abilities.name: Battlesuit Support System:
abilities.description: The bearer’s unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back, but when doing so only models equipped with this wargear can make ranged attacks.

abilities.name: Shield Generator:
abilities.description: The bearer has a 4+ invulnerable save.

abilities.name: Weapon Support System:
abilities.description: Each time the bearer makes a ranged attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Enforcer Commander
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a ranged attack targets that unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

abilities.name: Battlesuit Support System
abilities.description: The bearer’s unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back, but when doing so only models equipped with this wargear can make ranged attacks.

abilities.name: Shield Generator
abilities.description: The bearer has a 4+ invulnerable save.

abilities.name: Weapon Support System
abilities.description: Each time the bearer makes a ranged attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Agile Combatant
abilities.description: This model is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back.

abilities.name: Hero of the Empire (Aura)
abilities.description: While a friendly T’AU EMPIRE unit is within 6" of this model, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.

abilities.name: Advanced Guardian Drone
abilities.description: Each time a ranged attack targets the bearer, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

abilities.name: Command-link Drone (Aura)
abilities.description: While a friendly T’AU EMPIRE unit is within 6" of the bearer, each time you select that unit as the target of a Stratagem, roll one D6: on a 5+, you gain 1CP.

abilities.name: CORE
abilities.description: Infiltrators, Leader, Scouts

abilities.name: FACTION
abilities.description: For the Greater Good

abilities.name: Structural Analyser
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.

abilities.name: Jammer Array
abilities.description: Enemy units that are set up on the battlefield from Reserves cannot be set up within 12" of this model.

abilities.name: Failure Is Not an Option
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the  Feel  No  Pain  5+ ability.

abilities.name: Coordinated Leadership
abilities.description: At the end of your Command phase, roll one D6: on a 4+, you gain 1CP.

abilities.name: Hover Drone
abilities.description: The bearer can FLY and has a Move characteristic of 10".

abilities.name: Precise Targeting
abilities.description: While this model is a Guided unit, each time it makes an attack that targets its Spotted unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Designer’s Note
abilities.description: The Firesight Marksman model and sniper drone models are treated as a single model for all rules purposes. All distances are measured to and from the Farsight Marksman model. The sniper drone models do not count as models for any rules purposes.

abilities.name: CORE
abilities.description: Infiltrators, Leader, Scouts 7", Stealth

abilities.name: Ritual Butchery
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, melee weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.

abilities.name: Rites of Feasting
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 6+ ability. If that unit destroys one or more enemy units in the Fight phase, until the end of the battle, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability instead.

abilities.name: Advanced Scouting
abilities.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack that hits an enemy unit, until the end of the turn, each time another KROOT model from your army makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Fire and Fade
abilities.description: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, if it is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to 6". If it does, until the end of the turn, this model is not eligible to declare a charge.

abilities.name: Trail Finding
abilities.description: Once per turn, when an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move within 9" of this model’s unit, if this model’s unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to D6".

abilities.name: Kroot Ambush
abilities.description: After both players have deployed their armies, you can redeploy this model’s unit and one other friendly KROOT unit. When doing so, any of those units can be placed into Strategic Reserves, regardless of how many units are already in Strategic Reserves.

abilities.name: War Leader
abilities.description: Once per battle round, one unit from your army with this ability can use it when its unit is targeted with a Stratagem. If it does, reduce the CP cost of that use of that Stratagem by 1CP.

abilities.name: Root of Honour
abilities.description: Once per battle, at the start of any phase, you can select one friendly KROOT unit that is Battle-shocked and within 12" of this model. That unit is no longer Battle-shocked.

abilities.name: Inspirational Defiance
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in that unit.

abilities.name: Martial Warrior
abilities.description: Each time this model is selected to fight, select one of the following abilities to be active while resolving those attacks:

abilities.name: Direct Grace
abilities.description: Fidelity has the [PRECISION] ability.

abilities.name: Forceful Strike
abilities.description: Fidelity has the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

abilities.name: Whirling Stance
abilities.description: Fidelity has the [SUSTAINED HITS 2] ability instead of [SUSTAINED HITS 1].

abilities.name: Duality Shield
abilities.description: Once per battle, each time an attack targets this unit, it can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, models in this unit have a 2+ invulnerable save.

abilities.name: Paradox of Duality
abilities.description: Each time an attack targets this unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll and subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

abilities.name: Supreme Loyalty (Aura)
abilities.description: While a friendly T’AU EMPIRE unit is within 6" of this unit, each time that unit takes a Battle-shock or Leadership test, add 1 to that test.

abilities.name: Crisis Commander
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.

abilities.description: The bearer’s unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back, but when doing so only models equipped with this wargear can make ranged attacks.

abilities.description: The bearer has a 4+ invulnerable save.

abilities.description: Each time the bearer makes a ranged attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.

abilities.description: D3

abilities.description: Each time this model makes an attack that targets a  MONSTER or VEHICLE, add 1 to the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Targeting Array:
abilities.description: Each time this model is selected to shoot, you can re-roll one Hit roll or you can re-roll one Wound roll when resolving its attacks.

abilities.name: XV02 Pilot Battlesuit:
abilities.description: In your Command phase, you can select one friendly HAMMERHEAD GUNSHIP unit within 12". Until the start of your next Command phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

abilities.name: DAMAGED: 1-5 WOUNDS REMAINING
abilities.description: While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Eclipse Field Generator
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have a 5+ invulnerable save.

abilities.name: Assassin
abilities.description: Each time this model makes an attack that targets a Character unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Blacklight Marker Drones
abilities.description: Twice per battle, when this unit is an Observer unit, until the end of the phase, each time a ranged attack is made by a model in their Guided unit that targets their Spotted unit, re-roll a Wound roll of 1.

abilities.name: FACTION
abilities.description: For the Greater Good

abilities.name: Breach and Clear
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack that targets an enemy unit within range of an objective marker, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

abilities.name: DS8 Support Turret
abilities.description: In your Movement phase, if this unit Remains Stationary, until the start of your next Movement phase, its Fire Warrior Shas’ui model is equipped with the support turret missile system weapon.

abilities.name: Suppression Volley
abilities.description: In your Shooting phase, after this unit has shot, select one enemy INFANTRY unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the start of your next turn, while this unit is on the battlefield, that enemy unit is suppressed. While a unit is suppressed, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: DS8 Support Turret
abilities.description: In your Movement phase, if this unit Remains Stationary, until the start of your next Movement phase, its Fire Warrior Shas’ui model is equipped with the support turret missile system weapon.

abilities.description: D3

abilities.name: Rapid Deployment
abilities.description: Units can disembark from this TRANSPORT after it has Advanced. Units that do so count as having made a Normal move that phase, and cannot declare a charge in the same turn, but can otherwise act normally in the remainder of the turn.

abilities.name: Droneport
abilities.description: Each time this FORTIFICATION is selected to shoot, its drone defender’s weapon will target and resolve attacks against every enemy unit that is an eligible target to this FORTIFICATION.

abilities.name: Fortification
abilities.description: While an enemy unit is only within Engagement Range of one or more FORTIFICATIONS from your army: That unit can still be selected as the target of ranged attacks, but each time such an attack is made, unless it is made with a Pistol, subtract 1 from the Hit roll. Models in that unit do not need to take Desperate Escape tests due to Falling Back while Battle-shocked, except for those that will move over enemy models when doing so.

abilities.name: Tidewall Cover
abilities.description: Each time a ranged attack is allocated to a model, if that model is not fully visible to every model in the attacking unit because of this Fortification, that model has the Benefit of Cover against that attack.

abilities.name: TRANSPORT
abilities.description: This model has a transport capacity of 11 T’AU EMPIRE INFANTRY models. It cannot transport BATTLESUIT, KROOT or VESPID STINGWINGS models. If this model is equipped with a Tidewall defence platform, it has a transport capacity of 22 T’au Infantry models instead.

abilities.name: Fieldcraft
abilities.description: At the end of your Command phase, if this unit is within range of an objective marker you control, that objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

abilities.name: BODYGUARD
abilities.description: If this unit has a Starting Strength of 20, you can attach up to two Leader units to it instead of one, provided those Leaders are not duplicates (e.g. you cannot attach two WAR SHAPERS to this unit). If you do, and this unit is destroyed, the Leader units attached to it become separate units with their original Starting Strengths.

abilities.name: Bounty Hunters
abilities.description: At the start of the battle, select one unit from your opponent’s army. Each time a model in this unit makes an attack that targets that unit, that attack has the [LETHAL HITS] and [PRECISION] abilities.

abilities.name: Pech’ra
abilities.description: Ranged weapons equipped by the bearer’s unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability.

abilities.name: Hunting Hounds
abilities.description: While this unit is within 12" of one or more friendly KROOT CHARACTER models, the Objective Control characteristic of models in this unit is 1.

abilities.description: Scouts 7"

abilities.name: Kroot Linebreakers
abilities.description: Each time this unit ends a Charge move, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it, then roll one D6 for each model in this unit that is within Engagement Range of that enemy unit: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. If one or more enemy models are destroyed as a result of these mortal wounds, that enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test.

abilities.name: Kroot Packmates
abilities.description: Once per turn, in your opponent’s Shooting phase, when a friendly KROOT INFANTRY unit within 6" of this unit is selected as the target of an attack, one unit from your army with this ability can use it. If it does, after that enemy unit has finished making its attacks, that unit with this ability can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but when resolving those attacks it can only target that enemy unit (and only if it is an eligible target).

abilities.name: For the Greater Good
abilities.description: Once per turn, when using the Greater Good ability, you can select this unit to be an Observer unit for a second time. When doing so, you can change which enemy unit is this unit’s Spotted unit.

abilities.name: Grav-inhibitor Drone
abilities.description: Subtract 2 from Charge rolls made for any enemy unit that declares a charge against the bearer’s unit (this is not cumulative with any other reductions to that Charge roll).

abilities.name: Pulse Accelerator Drone
abilities.description: Add 6" to the Range characteristic of pulse carbines equipped by models in the bearer’s unit.

abilities.name: Drone Escort
abilities.description: Once per turn, in your opponent’s  Shooting phase , when a friendly  T’AU   EMPIRE unit within 6" of this unit is selected as the target of an attack, one unit from your army with this ability can use it. If it does, after that enemy unit has finished making its attacks, the unit using this ability can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but when resolving those attacks it can only target that enemy unit (and only if it is an eligible target).

abilities.name: Markerlight
abilities.description: The bearer has the  MARKERLIGHT keyword.

abilities.name: Thunderous Pounce
abilities.description: Each time this unit ends a Charge move , until the end of the turn, Knarloc beak and talons equipped by models in this unit have the [LANCE] ability.

abilities.name: CORE
abilities.description: Deadly Demise D6+2, Hover

abilities.name: FACTION
abilities.description: For the Greater Good

abilities.name: Jet Pack Insertion
abilities.description: At the end of your opponent’s Movement phase, one or more units embarked within this TRANSPORT can disembark from it, provided every model in each of those disembarking units has the Deep Strike ability.

abilities.name: DAMAGED: 1-9 WOUNDS REMAINING
abilities.description: While this model has 1-9 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll .

abilities.name: TRANSPORT
abilities.description: This model has a transport capacity of 48 T’AU EMPIRE INFANTRY models. This model can also transport up to 6 BATTLESUIT models (these models take up the space of a number of models equal to their Wounds characteristic, e.g. a Battlesuit with a Wounds characteristic of 8 would take up the space of 8 models). This model cannot transport KROOT or VESPID STINGWINGS models.

abilities.name: Deadly Demise
abilities.description: D6

abilities.name: Battlesuit Support System
abilities.description: This model is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back.

abilities.name: Nova Shielding
abilities.description: Once per battle, when this model is selected as the target of a ranged attack, it can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets this model, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of this model, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

abilities.name: Weapon Support System
abilities.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.

abilities.name: DAMAGED: 1-5 WOUNDS REMAINING
abilities.description: While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll .

abilities.name: One Shot
abilities.description: The bearer can only shoot with this weapon once per battle.

abilities.name: Aerial Disengagement
abilities.description: Once per turn, when an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move within 9" of this unit, if this unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to 6".

abilities.name: High-intensity Markerlights
abilities.description: Each time this unit is an Observer unit, until the end of the phase, each time a model in its Guided unit makes an attack that targets their Spotted unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Outflank
abilities.description: When this unit arrives from Strategic Reserves, it can be set up within your opponent’s deployment zone (all other restrictions still apply).

abilities.name: Photon Casters
abilities.description: In your Shooting phase, after this unit has shot, if an enemy INFANTRY unit was hit by one or more of those attacks, until the end of your opponent’s next turn, that enemy unit is stunned. While a unit is stunned, subtract 2 from that unit’s Move characteristic, and subtract 2 from Advance and Charge rolls made for that unit.

abilities.name: Battlesuit Support System
abilities.description: The bearer’s unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back, but when doing so only models equipped with this wargear can make ranged attacks.

abilities.name: Shield Generator
abilities.description: The bearer has a 4+ invulnerable save.

abilities.name: Weapon Support System
abilities.description: Each time the bearer makes a ranged attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Deadly Demise
abilities.description: D6

abilities.name: Battlesuit Support System
abilities.description: This model is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back.

abilities.name: Nova Burst
abilities.description: Once per battle, before this model makes a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, it can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, it has a Move characteristic of 18".

abilities.name: Weapon Support System
abilities.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.

abilities.name: DAMAGED: 1-5 WOUNDS REMAINING
abilities.description: While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
